duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee the Street Team Representatives in assigned markets to positively affect Nielsen measured accounts.
Facilitate relationships with accounts to advance the field sales presence and scope of the brand within stated objectives.
Oversee the timely completion and maintenance of records for timesheets, STR follow up, expenses, inventory, and other necessary reporting data.
Recruit, hire, train, and continuously develop the street team representatives, evaluating employee performance, and creating directives to enhance team performance.
Create, schedule, and maintain Street Team daily, weekly, monthly account routes.
Facilitate and enhance the Street Team Representatives by working with local Field Marketing Managers to obtain necessary tools and equipment for a successful market.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience, preferably in Business or Marketing
